title: Prevention of Child Abuse
decision_details:
- The proposal made by the Prime Minister Hon. Ranil Wickremasinghe, to appoint a Ministerial Committee comprising of the following, to make proposals on the suitable action to be taken to prevent daily increasing  child abuses,  was approved by the Cabinet. 

*	Hon. Thilak Marapana, Minister of Law & Order and Prison Reforms (Chairman)

*	Hon. Wijayadasa Rajapaksa, Minister of Justice 

*	Hon. (Mrs.) Chandrani Bandara, Minister of Women and Child Affairs 

*	Hon. (Mrs.) Wijayakala Maheswaran, State Minister of Child Affairs

*	Hon. (Mrs.) Sudharshani  Fernandopulle, State Minister of City Planning and Water Supply
